title: Over-sea;
author: Morford, Henry
snippet: The finest of the Perthshire Highland scenery was here ; for to the left wild Glentinlas shot up its tall pines, back of the heathery Craig More and the Glenfiiilas hills ; but only a few moments after, darting down a somewhat steep descent,  Loch Vennocliar lay sleeping under the lessening hills and the westering sun, with a broad, bright gleam resting  on the northwestern border, where lay Glendrig or Lanrick Mead, the gathering-place of Clan Alpine throuirh all their centuries of lawless power.

title: Over-Sea; or, England, France and Scotland as seen by a live American ... With numerous illustrations, etc
author: Morford, Henry.
snippet: The finest of the Perthshire Highland scenery was here ;for to the left wild Glenfinlas shot up its tall pines, back ofthe heathery Craig More and the Glenfinlas hills; but onlya few moments after, darting down a somewhat steep descent, Loch Vennochar lay sleeping under the lesseninghills and the westering sun, with a broad, bright gleam resting on the north western border, where lay Glendrig orLanrick Mead, the gathering-place of Clan Alpine throughall their centuries of lawless power.
